Running a Test Program Flow:

Class Summary
ChooseTestFileAction  
FileAction This class retieves a filename from the header, parses puts it in a FileBean and puts the bean in the session scope.
FilterFileAction This class retieves a filename from the header, parses puts it in a FileBean and puts the bean in the session scope.
FilterFileForm  
LoginAction  
LoginForm  
SystemAction  
TestAction This class retieves a filename from the header, parses puts it in a FileBean and puts the bean in the session scope.
TestForm  
TestResultAction This Action grades the test, both as a percentage out of one humdred, and as a pass/fail element added to each word element in the tested word file.
